GSD.description:
md-raid10: fix KASAN warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 7a6ccc8fa192fd357c2d5d4c6ce67c834a179e23. For more details please see the references link.
